channel.title: Willing to learn - dont know where to start
channel.description:
im interested in learning how to code my own server, i currently have my own server, i just dont know how to code it. Does anyone know where i can go to learn how to code? i literly dont know a single thing about coding a server.
Help greatly appriecated. =)

item.title: Willing to learn - dont know where to start
item.dc:creator: @Dish_Weed Dish Weed
item.description:
@Dish_Weed wrote:

Trust me you won’t find a tut on this because if you know the basics of java and look around in there and play around with the client.java you will soon become good at PS coding

Read full topic
item.source: Willing to learn - dont know where to start

item.title: Willing to learn - dont know where to start
item.dc:creator: @Keasho Keasho
item.description:
@Keasho wrote:

mr dharok:

here=] or look around rune-server.org

hhhm, i wouldnt of posted if i would have found a website that explians coding to me… and im prety sure that mopar or rune-server doesnt have a step by step guide to moparscape server coding. yes, they have little guides here and there about how to modify “codes”. But you have to understand server coding to do that.

Read full topic

item.title: Willing to learn - dont know where to start
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

if you msn me i can teach you a little
or aim, and yes, hovering in client.java is a good way too
you learn what is read by a compiler and what is not
etc

item.title: Willing to learn - dont know where to start
item.dc:creator: @Dish_Weed Dish Weed
item.description:
@Dish_Weed wrote:

I suggest downloading a good source and looking at it some of the stuff should be easy to under stand then start working with anything you really want most important thing is don’t give up always keep trying. just by looking at soem stuff and reading some stuff you will know how it works

Read full topic
